title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2210.2 - Maximum rent
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2210.2 - Maximum rent

State Regulations

The maximum rent for such housing accommodations, for the
purposes of these regulations, shall be the rent charged on May 31, 1968 or

June 30, 1974, whichever is applicable. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
2210.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
